articles.title: Matt Eberflus: Chicago Bears hire new coach - Chicago Tribune
articles.description: In his first move as Chicago Bears general manager, Ryan Poles hired Matt Eberflus from a group of finalists that included Dan Quinn and Jim Caldwell. Eberflus, 51, was the Indianapolis Colts defensive coordinator the last four seasons.
